text: Oh, perfect timing, Supradarky! I just beat Pokemon Diamond a month ago, and this theme has been going through my mind. When I played this game five years ago, I thought the themes were boring, but now, I like them, and they're quite catchy. ♪
author: Jirt

text:
At first, I didn't like ( almost hated) Diamond Pearl Platinum and the 4th generation, but now, I'm replaying Platinum and I think that these games are very close to Ruby Saphire Emerald in terms of music and ambiance ( Ruby is my favorite pokemon ).

I'm really enjoying this game and the 4th generation.

Lesson of the day: Don't be afraid of giving another look at your past.
